name: I am!!! The man who will become a navy officer!!!
text: Main Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [I am!!!] The man who will become a navy officer!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

effect.text: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [I am!!!] The man who will become a navy officer!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.
